description: Mappings from collected or source variables to target or harmonised variables, optionally including ETL syntax
Id of the resource that contains the source variable(s)
Name of the dataset that contains the source variable(s)
Optional, source variable that was mapped from. You may also indicate that a mapping to a target variable was not done and leave this field empty (match = not available)
Optional, variables from other source datasets. Initially one may only define mapping between releases
Id of the resource that contains the target variable
Name of the dataset that contains the target variable
Target variable that was mapped to
Id of the resource that contains the target variable
Name of the dataset that contains the target variable
Target variable that was mapped to
In case of mapping to a repeated variable, specify which repeats were mapped to
Harmonisation match, i.e., complete, partial, na
Human readible description of the mapping
Formal definition of the mapping, ideally in executable code
